H0.text: The capital of Brazil was moved from Rio de Janeiro to the purpose-built capital city of Brasilia in what year. 1955

H1.text: The capital of Brazil was moved from Rio de Janeiro to the purpose-built capital city of Brasilia in what year. 1958

H2.text: The capital of Brazil was moved from Rio de Janeiro to the purpose-built capital city of Brasilia in what year. 1962

H3.text: The capital of Brazil was moved from Rio de Janeiro to the purpose-built capital city of Brasilia in what year. 1960

A4.text: Brasília was founded by President Juscelino Kubitschek on 21 April 1960, to replace Rio de Janeiro as the national capital.

A5.text: Brasília was built in 41 months, from 1956 to 21 April 1960, when it was officially inaugurated.
